hero.title: Team
hero.subtitle: We are a professional development team

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a young, dynamic and passionate team of developers with technology, always ready to take on new challenges.

story.title: Our Story
paragraphs: Founded in 2019, we started with 3 members who share a passion for technology and a desire to create meaningful products.
From our first small projects, we have continuously learned, developed and expanded our team. Currently, we are proud to have 8 talented members, each of whom is an expert in their field.
We believe that technology can change the world, and we want to be part of that change.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To create high-quality technology products that meet the real needs of users and contribute to the development of the Vietnamese tech community.

speed.title: Speed & Performance
speed.description: We always optimize code and processes to ensure products run fast and smoothly.

quality.title: High Quality
quality.description: Every line of code is carefully reviewed and thoroughly tested before deployment.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: Collaboration and mutual support are the foundation of every successful project.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Always seeking new solutions and creative approaches to every problem.

features.title: Skills & Technology
features.subtitle: We possess diverse skills and experience in modern technology fields

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: React, Vue.js, Next.js, TypeScript, TailwindCSS - Creating modern and responsive user interfaces.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Node.js, Python, Django, PostgreSQL, MongoDB - Building powerful APIs and scalable backend systems.

mobile.title: Mobile Development
mobile.description: React Native, Flutter, iOS, Android - Developing cross-platform mobile applications with high performance.

design.title: UI/UX Design
design.description: Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch, Prototyping - Creating beautiful interfaces and optimal user experiences.

devops.title: DevOps & Cloud
devops.description: AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD - Deploying and operating cloud systems efficiently.

data.title: Data & Analytics
data.description: Python, SQL, Apache Spark, Machine Learning - Processing and analyzing data to provide valuable insights.

cta.title: Do you have a project that needs support?
cta.description: Let us help you turn your ideas into reality

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: Portfolio
projects.description: Explore the premium projects we have completed, from modern web applications to advanced AI solutions, all developed to the highest standards.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Talented and technology-passionate people, working together to create high-quality software products.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChooseUs.description: With diverse skills and experience, we can meet all your software development requirements.

notFound.title: 404 - Page Not Found
notFound.subtitle: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
notFound.description: It seems you've wandered into the digital void. Don't worry, we'll get you back home!
